name: 黃明熙
objective: 以Intel 80x86之微處理機為核心，分別介紹其系列微處理機之架構、軟體指令、硬體架構與其周邊之電路工作原理
schedule:
週次	單元內容
1	Ch1. Introduction to microprocessor and computer
2	Ch2. The microprocessor and its architecture
3	Ch2. The microprocessor and its architecture
4	Ch3. Addressing mode
5	Ch3. Addressing mode
6	Ch4. Data movement instructions
7	Ch5/6. Arithmetic and logic instructions and program
control instruction
8	Ch8. Programming the microprocessor
9	期中考
10	Ch10. Memory interface
11	Ch11. Basic I/O interface
12	Ch12. Interrupts
13	Ch12. Interrupts
14	Ch15. Bus interface
15	Ch15. Bus interface
16	Ch18. The 80386 microprocessor
17	Ch18. The pentium microprocessor
18	期末考
materials:
教科書:
Barry B. Brey, “The Intel Microprocessor-Architecture, Programming, and Interfacing,” 8 th edition, Pearson Prentice Hall, 2009
